hotels.name: Waldeck Namibia
hotels.desc: Luxury wilderness resort with bush experiences, starlit dinners, sunrise adventures
hotels.longDesc: Luxury meets wilderness with bush experiences, starlit dinners, and sunrise adventures, all with heartfelt Namibian hospitality.

hotels.name: Avani Windhoek Hotel & Casino
hotels.desc: Modern luxury hotel, rooftop pool, central location, excellent dining
hotels.longDesc: A contemporary luxury hotel in Windhoek's heart, perfect for families seeking comfort and convenience with outstanding amenities and restaurant options.
hotels.address: Gustav Voigts Centre, 129 Independence Ave, Windhoek, Namibia

hotels.name: Swakopmund Plaza Hotel
hotels.desc: Beachfront hotel, ocean views, family suites, excellent service and location
hotels.longDesc: A charming beachfront hotel in Swakopmund offering comfortable family accommodations with easy access to coastal activities and Atlantic Ocean views.

hotels.name: Strand Hotel
hotels.desc: Budget-friendly beachfront, family rooms, ocean access, casual atmosphere
hotels.longDesc: An affordable beachfront hotel in Swakopmund perfect for families wanting direct beach access without premium pricing, offering comfortable casual accommodations.

hotels.name: Villa Margherita Boutique Hotel & Restaurant
hotels.desc: Charming boutique hotel, personalized service, beachfront location, romantic escape
hotels.longDesc: An intimate boutique hotel offering personalized hospitality and beachfront charm, ideal for families seeking a more exclusive and curated coastal experience.

restaurants.name: The Delight Hotel Swakopmund, Gondwana Collection Namibia
restaurants.desc: Local cuisine, warm atmosphere, traditional Namibian dishes, family-friendly
restaurants.longDesc: A beloved local restaurant serving authentic Namibian cuisine in a welcoming setting, ideal for families wanting to experience regional flavors and hospitality.
restaurants.photoAttribution: The Delight Hotel Swakopmund, Gondwana Collection Namibia

restaurants.name: Jetty 1905 Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Fine dining seafood, ocean views, fresh fish, elegant coastal setting
restaurants.longDesc: An upscale seafood restaurant offering fresh catches and refined cuisine with panoramic views of Swakopmund's historic jetty and Atlantic coastline.
restaurants.address: A, 1905 On the Jetty Bridge, Swakopmund, Namibia

restaurants.name: Cafe Anton Confectionery | Cakes & Cookies
restaurants.desc: Fresh pastries, excellent coffee, light lunch, casual family-friendly cafe
restaurants.longDesc: A charming local bakery and cafe offering fresh-baked goods and quality coffee, ideal for family breakfast or casual lunch with a welcoming atmosphere.

restaurants.name: The Olive Exclusive All-Suite Hotel
restaurants.desc: Contemporary fine dining, African cuisine, innovative menus, special occasions
restaurants.longDesc: An award-winning restaurant serving creative African-inspired cuisine in an elegant setting, perfect for memorable family dinners celebrating special moments.

restaurants.name: The Tug Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Iconic waterfront seafood restaurant built on historic tugboat

experiences.name: Namibia
experiences.desc: Green river corridor cutting through desert plains, remote landscape beauty
experiences.longDesc: A green river corridor cuts through Namibia's vast desert plains, creating a striking contrast in this remote, geographically isolated destination.

experiences.name: Independence Museum
experiences.desc: Cultural heritage museum, interactive exhibits, Namibian history, educational
experiences.longDesc: Explore Namibia's rich cultural and natural heritage through engaging exhibits that educate and inspire visitors of all ages about the nation's diverse history.
experiences.address: C3JQ+F59 Independence Memorial Museum, Windhuk, Namibia

experiences.name: Sossusvlei
experiences.desc: Iconic sand dunes, stunning red desert landscape, photography paradise, adventure
experiences.longDesc: The most photographed dunes in Namibia offer breathtaking desert scenery and unforgettable family adventures amid towering red sand formations.

experiences.name: Okaukuejo
experiences.desc: Premier safari destination, wildlife viewing, elephant encounters, natural wonders
experiences.longDesc: One of Africa's greatest wildlife reserves where families can experience thrilling game drives and witness diverse animals in their natural habitat.

experiences.name: Swakopmund Mole
experiences.desc: Popular public beach in Swakopmund with pier and promenade, ideal for families

experiences.name: Swakopmund Museum
experiences.desc: Compact museum with natural history, local culture, and marine exhibits perfect for young children

experiences.name: Elim Dune
experiences.desc: Accessible red sand dune near Sesriem, popular sunset viewing spot in Sossusvlei region

experiences.name: Swakopmund, Beach
experiences.desc: Main public beach and promenade area in Swakopmund

experiences.name: Desert, Dunes and Dust Tours

experiences.name: Okaukuejo Etosha
experiences.desc: Famous floodlit waterhole at Okaukuejo Camp for wildlife viewing
experiences.address: RW98+H7W Etosha National Park, Okaukuejo, Namibia

experiences.name: Christuskirche
experiences.desc: Historic Lutheran church built in 1907, iconic landmark with German colonial architecture in central Windhoek
experiences.address: C3JP+VVQ, Robert Mugabe Ave, Windhoek, Namibia

experiences.name: Penduka Village
experiences.desc: Craft center and shop near Windhoek featuring local Namibian handicrafts

kidFriendly.name: Spitzkoppe Cabin Camp
kidFriendly.desc: Dramatic granite peaks, scenic hiking trails, rock formations, family adventure
kidFriendly.longDesc: A spectacular mountain landscape with accessible trails and stunning rock formations, offering families adventurous hiking and unforgettable desert views.

markets.name: Namibia Craft Centre
markets.desc: Local artisan crafts, handmade jewelry, authentic souvenirs, cultural products
markets.longDesc: A curated marketplace showcasing genuine Namibian crafts and artisan goods, perfect for families seeking authentic souvenirs supporting local creators.
